name: Healing Pumpkin Seeds
author: Buckwheat Queen
summary: Roasted pumpkin seeds using ingredients and method to optimize the nutrients for a healthy snack. This recipe intentionally leaves out any salt.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons coconut oil, melted, or more to taste
1 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Mix coconut oil, turmeric, black pepper, cayenne pepper, and ginger together in a small bowl
Place pumpkin seeds in a bowl; drizzle coconut oil mixture on top
Stir well to coat all seeds with the mixture
Spread evenly on the parchment paper; drizzle any remaining oil on top
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly golden, about 15 minutes
Leave seeds inside the oven as it cools
